
help()
    Prints help text.

    Examples
    --------
    > help()


help( alias )
    Prints help text for a specified alias.

    Parameters
    ----------
    alias: any
        Alias (an object reference, literal, or a string).

    Examples
    --------
    > help( help )
    > help( 'help' )


help( alias.<key> )
    Prints help text for a specified property.

    Parameters
    ----------
    alias.<key>: any
        Alias property (an object reference, literal, or a string).

    Examples
    --------
    > help( {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from )
    > help( '{{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}.from' )
